channel.title: Response on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Response on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Correction
item.description: The problem As we are simulating physics, and not actually doing it, there is an imprecision coming with the program. For example, the collision point is not going to be exactly on the intersection of the two shapes. After the collision has been detected, the two shapes would already be overlapping. The imprecision can be “corrected in a few ways. The goal of this page is to show you different ways of doing it.
